personalInfo.name: Awais
personalInfo.myDescription:
Working as an aspiring and dedicated Mobile Application Developer and having six-years post qualification experience in iOS app development and deployment at Apple Store. 


I possess proven successful experience of creating, maintaining, and implementing source code for back-end functionalities mobile and web applications to work properly and also of designing and developing user interfaces. 


Equipped with first-class analytical and apt problem-solving skills; I am able to work on own initiative and as a reliable part of cross-functional team!!!

Giving support to operations for delivering the mobile applications
